channel.title: Unkillable npcs
channel.description: I have a wise old man in my training area and people are using ancients on it. But it has no lvl so the game just crashes. I put under the spell if(nonwild()) { sendMessage("You are not in wild")} When i added that it came to that message when u use ice burst on npc, but it still does the spell. I am asking for either a way to make him non attackable with magic or just how to fix the nonwild thingy so if they in nonwild they can't be killed.

item.title: Unkillable npcs
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

On your ::rules, make a rules saying ‘No attacking non-combat NPC’s’ Then make it a kickable offense to do so.

Read full topic

item.title: Unkillable npcs
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

Ya same thing for me what I do is I just make a npc say “no ATTACKING NPCS” or I put it on when you log in and just ban anyone who does.

Read full topic

item.title: Unkillable npcs
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

I have a wise old man in my training area and people are using ancients on it. But it has no lvl so the game just crashes. I put under the spell if(nonwild()) { sendMessage(“You are not in wild”)}
When i added that it came to that message when u use ice burst on npc, but it still does the spell. I am asking for either a way to make him non attackable with magic or just how to fix the nonwild thingy so if they in nonwild they can’t be killed.

Read full topic
